body_html:
I think I will close this now and look for your help later if I get into similar trouble
@pjh5

Update

  1. New environment created with no conda-forge packages
  2. conda install -c caffe2 caffe2-cuda9.0-cudnn7
  3. python -c 'from caffe2.python import core' 2>/dev/null && echo "Success" || echo "Failure" results in success
  4. python -c 'from caffe2.python import workspace' 2>/dev/null && echo "Success" || echo "Failure" results in success

body:
I think I will close this now and look for your help later if I get into similar trouble
@pjh5
## Update

1. New environment created with no conda-forge packages
2. conda install -c caffe2 caffe2-cuda9.0-cudnn7
3. python -c 'from caffe2.python import core' 2>/dev/null && echo "Success" || echo "Failure" results in **success**
4. python -c 'from caffe2.python import workspace' 2>/dev/null && echo "Success" || echo "Failure" results in **success**
